comment._content: Born 1867, Anna Elizabeth Kölling, in Hamburg, into a musical family; educated in New York; secretary, National Society for the Promotion of Grand Opera in English: books.google.com/books?id=qIEFAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA715&... Her uncle Carl Kölling: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_K%C3%B6lling
